name: Clone Bound
description:
Fast paced game where the point is to understand the pattern and figure the moves and timing required to get to the other side.

Android:

The game is played by swiping up, down, left, and right to control the character or by using the touch buttons which can be activated in the settings menu.

Windows:

The game is played by moving with the arrow keys or "WASD" keys and using the mouse to navigate the menu. The PC version of the game is a port, the game is designed for mobile.

Constructive criticism is appreciated as this is my first project.
